actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to prohibit the extension of nondiscriminatory treatment to the products of any country not a party to certain treaties relating to the control and non-proliferation of nuclear weapons.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to prohibit the President from extending most-favored-nation treatment to the products of countries which are not parties to specified treaties controlling nuclear weapons.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to prohibit the extension of nondiscriminatory treatment to the products of any country not a party to certain treaties relating to the control and non-proliferation of nuclear weapons.
